languages.text: {n}Ответом вам служит глухое молчание, однако движение глаз за закрытыми веками позволяет понять, что эльдарка, по крайней мере, еще жива.{/n}
{n}Your words are met with deafening silence, but the flicker of Yrliet's eyes beneath her closed lids lets you know that she is still alive, at least.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Ответом вам служит глухое молчание, однако движение глаз за закрытыми веками позволяет понять, что эльдарка, по крайней мере, еще жива.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Your words are met with deafening silence, but the flicker of Yrliet's eyes beneath her closed lids lets you know that she is still alive, at least.{/n}

{n}Your words are met with deafening silence, but the flicker of Yrliet's eyes beneath her closed lids lets you know that she is still alive, at least.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Tus palabras obtienen un silencio ensordecedor como única respuesta, pero el leve movimiento de los ojos de Yrliet bajo sus párpados cerrados te indica que por lo menos sigue viva.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your words are met with deafening silence, but the flicker of Yrliet's eyes beneath her closed lids lets you know that she is still alive, at least.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Tus palabras obtienen un silencio ensordecedor como única respuesta, pero el leve movimiento de los ojos de Yrliet bajo sus párpados cerrados te indica que por lo menos sigue viva.{/n}

languages.text: {n}こちらが呟いても彼女はまったく反応しないが、ユリエットの閉じたまぶたがかすかに動いているので、少なくとも死んでいるわけではなさそうだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your words are met with deafening silence, but the flicker of Yrliet's eyes beneath her closed lids lets you know that she is still alive, at least.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}こちらが呟いても彼女はまったく反応しないが、ユリエットの閉じたまぶたがかすかに動いているので、少なくとも死んでいるわけではなさそうだ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}回应你话语的只有压倒性的寂静，但伊莉耶特颤动的眼睑让你知道她至少还活着。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your words are met with deafening silence, but the flicker of Yrliet's eyes beneath her closed lids lets you know that she is still alive, at least.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}回应你话语的只有压倒性的寂静，但伊莉耶特颤动的眼睑让你知道她至少还活着。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vos paroles sont accueillies par un silence assourdissant, mais le mouvement des yeux d'Yrliet derrière ses paupières closes vous indique qu'elle est toujours vivante.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your words are met with deafening silence, but the flicker of Yrliet's eyes beneath her closed lids lets you know that she is still alive, at least.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vos paroles sont accueillies par un silence assourdissant, mais le mouvement des yeux d'Yrliet derrière ses paupières closes vous indique qu'elle est toujours vivante.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Deine Worte werden mit einem ohrenbetäubenden Schweigen quittiert, doch das Flackern von Yrliets Augen unter ihren geschlossenen Lidern lässt dich wissen, dass sie zumindest noch lebt.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your words are met with deafening silence, but the flicker of Yrliet's eyes beneath her closed lids lets you know that she is still alive, at least.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Deine Worte werden mit einem ohrenbetäubenden Schweigen quittiert, doch das Flackern von Yrliets Augen unter ihren geschlossenen Lidern lässt dich wissen, dass sie zumindest noch lebt.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Sözlerinin ardından ortama ölüm sessizliği hâkim oluyor. Yrliet'in sıkı sıkıya kapattığı göz kapaklarının ardına gizlenen gözleri titreşerek en azından hâlâ hayatta olduğunu belli ediyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your words are met with deafening silence, but the flicker of Yrliet's eyes beneath her closed lids lets you know that she is still alive, at least.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Sözlerinin ardından ortama ölüm sessizliği hâkim oluyor. Yrliet'in sıkı sıkıya kapattığı göz kapaklarının ardına gizlenen gözleri, titreşmesiyle en azından hâlâ hayatta olduğunu belli ediyor.{/n}
